com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di

Interface BeanFactoryPostProcessor


  • public interface BeanFactoryPostProcessor

    This interface enables an InfinitumContext to have its BeanFactory modified after it has been configured.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postProcessBeanFactory(BeanFactory beanFactory)
      Post process the BeanFactory after the InfinitumContext has been initialized.

        Post process the BeanFactory after the InfinitumContext has been initialized.
        Parameters:
        beanFactory - the BeanFactory to modify
